snippet: The plan will include measures to prevent bank runs and push for the repeal of regulations that hinder competition, keep young people out of the work force or make it difficult to start businesses.
abstract: Mario Draghi, the head of the European Central Bank, and other euro zone leaders are working on a grand vision for the euro zone meant to reassure investors and allies that flaws in the currency union will be addressed quickly; plan will include measures to prevent bank runs and reduce what has become a vicious cycle of government debt.

byline.contributor: James Kanter and Paul Geitner contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The plan will include measures to prevent bank runs and push for the repeal of regulations that hinder competition, keep young people out of the work force or make it difficult to start businesses.

headline.seo: European Leaders Present Plan to Quell Euro Zone Crisis
headline.main: European Leaders to Present Plan to Quell the Crisis Quickly
headline.print_headline: European Leaders to Present Plan to Quickly Quell the Crisis
